content.rendered: Lorraine is a young 61 year old grandmother, with a penchant of getting into trouble. She feels like she is a big character that both staff and student alike can turn to for help. She is a very honest and hardworking member of the Student Support team. This is not just a job for her. She gets a huge sense of accomplishment when she is able to help a student resolve an issue that they may have. Whatever task is asked of Lorraine, she always gives it 100%.
